name: Calhantion
description:
Calhantion is the thesis of my career as a Video Game Development student in Argentina. 

It is a Third Person Shooter multiplayer where the characters are mythological and you can change any of the skills you are using at any time of the games.

Play alone or with friends in frenetic mythological battles in a local network video game where there will be no shortage of laughs, yes the aim.

Characters avalibles:

  • Anhur
  • Anubis
  • Fenrir
  • Kukulkan
  • Ra
  • Sobek
